mapper.insert: insert into rentlog(name, cellPhone, ID,cID, status,deltaMoney, licensePlate,logTime) values (#{name},#{cellPhone},#{userID},#{carID},#{status},#{deltaMoney},#{licensePlate},current_time)
mapper.select: select count(*) from rentlog where ID=#{userID}
select logID,name,cellPhone,ID,logTime,status,licensePlate,-deltaMoney 'deltaMoney' from rentlog order by logTime desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
